description: Shopee Open Platform is a go-to source of Open APIs and services for developers serving Shopee sellers with different ecommerce needs

key_features.name: Powerful APIs
key_features.description: Access to wide range of Open APIs for orders, products, marketing and push notification services

key_features.name: Comprehensive developer services
key_features.description: End-to-end developer support including onboarding, APP development, testing, release, and maintenance

key_features.name: Management Features
items: Get important information through Announcement page, Documentation, and Support Center

notes: This appears to be the introduction page of Shopee Open Platform documentation. It contains general information about the platform rather than specific API endpoint details. The page is structured with a navigation sidebar on the left and main content describing platform overview, benefits, and access information.
